prompts.promptTemplateDescription: Use this template with your favorite AI assistant. Customize the text in brackets to suit your needs.
prompts.promptTemplateStep2: Replace the [bracketed] text with your preferences
prompts.promptTemplateStep3: Paste into your favorite AI assistant
prompts.promptTemplateStep4: Refine as needed for better results
prompts.noExamples: No examples available for this prompt
prompts.sampleOutputsDescription: See how different AI assistants respond to this prompt to help you choose the right one for your needs.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content1: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of SALTBROTH's application.
overview.content2: By accessing this application, we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full.

access.title: Access to the Application
access.content1: You must be at least 18 years of age to use this application.
access.content2: We reserve the right to deny access to the application to anyone for any reason at any time.

list.item1: You must not share your account with anyone.
list.item2: You must not use the application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
list.item3: You must not interfere with or disrupt the application or its servers.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.intro: You are prohibited from engaging in the following activities:

list.item1: Using the application for any illegal activities.
list.item3: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the application.
list.item4: Using the application to harass or intimidate others.
list.item5: Disrupting the application or its servers in any way.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content1: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of SALTBROTH and is protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectual.content2: Users may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express permission.

userContent.title: User Generated Content
userContent.content1: By submitting content to our platform, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, modify, and distribute that content.
userContent.content2: You retain ownership of your content but are responsible for ensuring it doesn't infringe on others' rights.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content1: We may terminate or suspend access to our application immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever.
termination.content2: Upon termination, your right to use the application will cease immediately.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update our Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to high-quality AI prompts and foster a community of innovation.
mission.vision: We envision a future where AI technology is accessible and beneficial to everyone.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the passionate individuals behind SALTBROTH

member1.name: John Smith
member1.bio: AI enthusiast with 15 years of experience in tech leadership.

member2.name: Sarah Johnson
member2.bio: PhD in Machine Learning with expertise in prompt engineering.

member3.name: Michael Chen
member3.bio: Dedicated to building and nurturing our vibrant community.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content1: Welcome to SALTBROTH. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
intro.content2: This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our service to you.

personal.title: Personal Data
personal.content: While using our service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. This may include:

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We may also collect information on how the service is accessed and used. This usage data may include:

list.item1: Your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address)
list.item3: Pages of our service that you visit

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.intro: We use the collected data for various purposes:

list.item1: To provide and maintain our service
list.item2: To notify you about changes to our service
list.item4: To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the service
list.item5: To monitor the usage of the service

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content1: We do not sell, trade, or rent users' personal identification information to others.
sharing.content2: We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content1: We use cookies to collect information and improve our services. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.
cookies.content2: However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service does not address anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
